Sequence Information.Source: Myrmecia banksi (Jack jumper ant) (Australian jumper ant)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15246874]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC<6.25 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC<50 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC<25 µM), Escherichia coli (MIC<6.25 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.15246874]Non-hemolytic activity at 50 μM against human whole blood
Sequence Information.Function: Shows activity against E.coli and S.aureus, moderate activity against P.aeruginosa, weak activity against B.subtilis, and has no effect against L.garvieae, C.albicans, and S.cerevisiae. Has no hemolytic nor cytolytic activity. Causes an IgE-independent histamine release.

Literature.Title: Molecular cloning and biological characterization of novel antimicrobial peptides, pilosulin 3 and pilosulin 5, from a species of the Australian ant genus Myrmecia.
Literature.Author: Inagaki H, Akagi M, Imai HT, Taylor RW, Kubo T.

Literature.Title: Molecular cloning and biological characterization of novel antimicrobial peptides, pilosulin 3 and pilosulin 4, from a species of the Australian ant genus Myrmecia.
Literature.Author: Kubo T.,Taylor R.W.,Imai H.T.,Akagi M.,Inagaki H.
